OOC: I'm going to pretend that people weren't just ignoring my character for 
now.

::Firaxis::
       He wakes up from his nap again and looks at his board.  He sighs.  
"Still no calls.  They must not have heard me."  He keys the com for a wide 
band signal to anyone and everyone on the planet.  "This is Firaxis the 
mercenary.  I am here because my dog died.  I am willing to fight if someone 
will give me a blank protoform.  I will discuss terms with those who reply to 
me."  He closes down the com channel and goes back to his light napping.

--part1_13c.bb75ee9.29d3e429_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
